   20: 
   21: -module(beam_bounds_SUITE).
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   24:          addition_bounds/1, subtraction_bounds/1,
   25:          multiplication_bounds/1, division_bounds/1, rem_bounds/1,
   26:          band_bounds/1, bor_bounds/1, bxor_bounds/1,
   27:          bsr_bounds/1, bsl_bounds/1,
   28:          bnot_bounds/1,
   29:          lt_bounds/1, le_bounds/1, gt_bounds/1, ge_bounds/1,
   30:          min_bounds/1, max_bounds/1,
   31:          abs_bounds/1,
   32:          infer_lt_gt_bounds/1,
   33:          redundant_masking/1]).
   34: 
   35: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   36: 
   37: all() ->
   38:     [{group,p}].
   39: 
   40: groups() ->
   41:     [{p,[parallel],
   42:       [addition_bounds,
   43:        subtraction_bounds,
   44:        multiplication_bounds,
   45:        division_bounds,
   46:        rem_bounds,
   47:        band_bounds,
   48:        bor_bounds,
   49:        bxor_bounds,
   50:        bnot_bounds,
   51:        bsr_bounds,
   52:        bsl_bounds,
   53:        lt_bounds,
   54:        le_bounds,
   55:        gt_bounds,
   56:        ge_bounds,
   57:        min_bounds,
   58:        max_bounds,
   59:        abs_bounds,
   60:        infer_lt_gt_bounds,
   61:        redundant_masking]}].
   62: 
   63: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   64:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   65:     Config.
   66: 
   67: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   68:     ok.
   69: 
   70: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   71:     Config.
   72: 
   73: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   74:     Config.
   75: 
   76: addition_bounds(_Config) ->
   77:     test_commutative('+', {-12,12}),
   78: 
   79:     {'-inf',-15} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {'-inf',-20}, {2,5}),
   80:     {'-inf',55} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {'-inf',50}, {'-inf',5}),
   81:     {'-inf',110} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {1,10}, {'-inf',100}),
   82:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {1,'+inf'}, {'-inf',100}),
   83: 
   84:     {-8,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {2,'+inf'}, {-10,20}),
   85:     {6,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {1,10}, {5,'+inf'}),
   86:     {9,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('+', {2,'+inf'}, {7,'+inf'}),
   87: 
   88:     ok.
   89: 
   90: subtraction_bounds(_Config) ->
   91:     test_noncommutative('-', {-12,12}),
   92: 
   93:     {'-inf',18} = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {'-inf',20}, {2,9}),
   94:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {'-inf',20}, {'-inf',17}),
   95:     {-99,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {1,10}, {'-inf',100}),
   96:     {-93,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {7,'+inf'}, {'-inf',100}),
   97: 
   98:     {-18,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {2,'+inf'}, {-10,20}),
   99:     {'-inf',6} = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {1,11}, {5,'+inf'}),
  100:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('-', {2,'+inf'}, {7,'+inf'}),
  101: 
  102:     ok.
  103: 
  104: multiplication_bounds(_Config) ->
  105:     test_commutative('*', {-12,12}),
  106: 
  107:     {'-inf',-40} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {'-inf',-20}, {2,5}),
  108:     {'-inf',1000} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {'-inf',100}, {1,10}),
  109:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {'-inf',100}, {-10,10}),
  110: 
  111:     {-100,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {-10,'+inf'}, {1,10}),
  112:     {7,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {7,'+inf'}, {1,10}),
  113:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {-10,'+inf'}, {-5,5}),
  114: 
  115:     {'-inf',1000} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {1,10}, {'-inf',100}),
  116:     {-100,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('*', {1,10}, {-10,'+inf'}),
  117: 
  118:     ok.
  119: 
  120: division_bounds(_Config) ->
  121:     test_noncommutative('div', {-12,12}),
  122: 
  123:     {'-inf',-5} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {'-inf',-20}, {2,4}),
  124:     {'-inf',50} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {'-inf',100}, {2,4}),
  125: 
  126:     {-5,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {-10,'+inf'}, {2,4}),
  127:     {2,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {10,'+inf'}, {2,4}),
  128: 
  129:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('div', {10,'+inf'}, {0,0}),
  130:     {'EXIT', {badarith, _}} = catch division_bounds_1([], ok),
  131: 
  132:     ok.
  133: 
  134: %% GH-6604: Division by zero could cause type analysis to hang forever as
  135: %% beam_bounds would return a bogus result.
  136: division_bounds_1([], X) ->
  137:     -1 div division_bounds_1(X, ok);
  138: division_bounds_1(_, _) ->
  139:     0.
  140: 
  141: rem_bounds(_Config) ->
  142:     test_noncommutative('rem', {-12,12}),
  143: 
  144:     {-7,7} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', any, {1,8}),
  145:     {-11,11} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', any, {-12,8}),
  146: 
  147:     {-7,7} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {'-inf',10}, {1,8}),
  148:     {0,7} = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {10,'+inf'}, {1,8}),
  149: 
  150:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {1,10}, {'-inf',10}),
  151:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {1,10}, {10,'+inf'}),
  152: 
  153:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {-10,10}, {'-inf',10}),
  154:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('rem', {-10,10}, {10,'+inf'}),
  155: 
  156:     ok.
  157: 
  158: band_bounds(_Config) ->
  159:     test_commutative('band'),
  160: 
  161:     %% Coverage.
  162:     {0,17} = beam_bounds:bounds('band', any, {7,17}),
  163:     {0,42} = beam_bounds:bounds('band', {0,42}, any),
  164:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('band', {-1,1}, any),
  165:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('band', any, {-10,0}),
  166:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('band', {-10,0}, {-1,10}),
  167:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('band', {-20,-10}, {-1,10}),
  168: 
  169:     ok.
  170: 
  171: bor_bounds(_Config) ->
  172:     test_commutative('bor'),
  173: 
  174:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bor', {-10,0},{-1,10}),
  175:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bor', {-20,-10}, {-1,10}),
  176: 
  177:     ok.
  178: 
  179: bxor_bounds(_Config) ->
  180:     test_commutative('bxor'),
  181: 
  182:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bxor', {-10,0}, {-1,10}),
  183:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bxor', {-20,-10}, {-1,10}),
  184: 
  185:     ok.
  186: 
  187: bnot_bounds(_Config) ->
  188:     Min = -7,
  189:     Max = 7,
  190:     Seq = lists:seq(Min, Max),
  191:     _ = [bnot_bounds_1({A,B}) ||
  192:             A <- Seq,
  193:             B <- lists:nthtail(A-Min, Seq)],
  194: 
  195:     {-43,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', {'-inf',42}),
  196:     {99,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', {'-inf',-100}),
  197:     {'-inf',-8} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', {7,'+inf'}),
  198:     {'-inf',9} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', {-10,'+inf'}),
  199:     {-1114111,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', {'-inf', 1114110}),
  200: 
  201:     -1 = bnot_bounds_2(0),
  202: 
  203:     {'EXIT',{_,_}} = catch bnot_bounds_3(id(true)),
  204:     {'EXIT',{_,_}} = catch bnot_bounds_3(id(false)),
  205:     {'EXIT',{_,_}} = catch bnot_bounds_3(id(0)),
  206: 
  207:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,-3},_}} = catch bnot_bounds_4(),
  208: 
  209:     ok.
  210: 
  211: bnot_bounds_1(R) ->
  212:     {HighestMin,LowestMax} = min_max_unary_op('bnot', R),
  213:     {Min,Max} = beam_bounds:bounds('bnot', R),
  214:     if
  215:         Min =< HighestMin, LowestMax =< Max ->
  216:             ok;
  217:         true ->
  218:             io:format("bnot(~p) evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  219:                       [R,{Min,Max},{HighestMin,LowestMax}]),
  220:             ct:fail(bad_min_or_max)
  221:         end.
  222: 
  223: %% GH-7145: 'bnot' converged too slowly, effectively hanging the compiler.
  224: bnot_bounds_2(0) -> -1;
  225: bnot_bounds_2(N) -> abs(bnot bnot_bounds_2(N)).
  226: 
  227: %% GH-7468. Would result in a bad_typed_register failure in beam_validator.
  228: bnot_bounds_3(A) ->
  229:     (bnot round(((A xor false) andalso 1) + 2)) bsr ok.
  230: 
  231: %% GH-7468. Would result in a bad_arg_type failure in beam_validator.
  232: bnot_bounds_4() ->
  233:     << 0 || A <- [1,2], _ <- bnot round(A + trunc(A))>>.
  234: 
  235: bsr_bounds(_Config) ->
  236:     test_noncommutative('bsr', {-12,12}, {0,7}),
  237: 
  238:     {0,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {0,10}, {0,'+inf'}),
  239:     {0,2} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {0,10}, {2,'+inf'}),
  240: 
  241:     {-1,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {-1,10}, {0,'+inf'}),
  242:     {-100,900} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {-100,900}, {0,'+inf'}),
  243:     {-50,450} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {-100,900}, {1,'+inf'}),
  244: 
  245:     {'-inf',16} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {'-inf',32}, {1,10}),
  246:     {-5,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsr', {-10,'+inf'}, {1,10}),
  247: 
  248:     ok.
  249: 
  250: bsl_bounds(_Config) ->
  251:     test_noncommutative('bsl', {-12,12}, {-7,7}),
  252: 
  253:     {2,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {1,10}, {1,10_000}),
  254:     {0,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {1,10}, {-10,10_000}),
  255:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-7,10}, {1,10_000}),
  256: 
  257:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-10,100}, {0,'+inf'}),
  258:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-10,100}, {1,'+inf'}),
  259:     any = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-10,100}, {-1,'+inf'}),
  260: 
  261:     {0,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {1,10}, {'-inf',0}),
  262:     {0,20} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {1,10}, {'-inf',1}),
  263:     {-7,10} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-7,10}, {'-inf',0}),
  264:     {-28,40} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-7,10}, {'-inf',2}),
  265: 
  266:     {'-inf',-1} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {-10,-1}, {500,1024}),
  267:     {0,'+inf'} = beam_bounds:bounds('bsl', {1,10}, {500,1024}),
  268: 
  269:     ok.
  270: 
  271: lt_bounds(_Config) ->
  272:     test_relop('<').
  273: 
  274: le_bounds(_Config) ->
  275:     test_relop('=<').
  276: 
  277: gt_bounds(_Config) ->
  278:     test_relop('>').
  279: 
  280: ge_bounds(_Config) ->
  281:     test_relop('>=').
  282: 
  283: min_bounds(_Config) ->
  284:     test_commutative(min, {-12,12}),
  285: 
  286:     {'-inf',-10} = min_bounds({'-inf',-10}, {1,100}),
  287:     {'-inf',1} = min_bounds({'-inf',1}, {1,100}),
  288:     {'-inf',50} = min_bounds({'-inf',50}, {1,100}),
  289:     {'-inf',100} = min_bounds({'-inf',500}, {1,100}),
  290: 
  291:     {'-inf',-10} = min_bounds({'-inf',-10}, {1,'+inf'}),
  292:     {'-inf',1} = min_bounds({'-inf',1}, {1,'+inf'}),
  293:     {'-inf',700} = min_bounds({'-inf',700}, {1,'+inf'}),
  294: 
  295:     {1,99} = min_bounds({1,99}, {100,'+inf'}),
  296:     {1,100} = min_bounds({1,100}, {100,'+inf'}),
  297:     {100,200} = min_bounds({150,200}, {100,'+inf'}),
  298: 
  299:     ok.
  300: 
  301: min_bounds(R1, R2) ->
  302:     Result = beam_bounds:bounds(min, R1, R2),
  303:     Result = beam_bounds:bounds(min, R2, R1).
  304: 
  305: max_bounds(_Config) ->
  306:     test_commutative(max, {-12,12}),
  307: 
  308:     {1,100} = max_bounds({'-inf',-10}, {1,100}),
  309:     {1,100} = max_bounds({'-inf',1}, {1,100}),
  310:     {1,100} = max_bounds({'-inf',50}, {1,100}),
  311:     {1,500} = max_bounds({'-inf',500}, {1,100}),
  312: 
  313:     {1,'+inf'}  = max_bounds({'-inf',-10}, {1,'+inf'}),
  314:     {1,'+inf'} = max_bounds({'-inf',1}, {1,'+inf'}),
  315:     {1,'+inf'} = max_bounds({'-inf',700}, {1,'+inf'}),
  316: 
  317:     {100,'+inf'} = max_bounds({1,99}, {100,'+inf'}),
  318:     {100,'+inf'} = max_bounds({1,100}, {100,'+inf'}),
  319:     {150,'+inf'} = max_bounds({150,200}, {100,'+inf'}),
  320: 
  321:     ok.
  322: 
  323: max_bounds(R1, R2) ->
  324:     Result = beam_bounds:bounds(max, R1, R2),
  325:     Result = beam_bounds:bounds(max, R2, R1).
  326: 
  327: abs_bounds(_Config) ->
  328:     Min = -7,
  329:     Max = 7,
  330:     Seq = lists:seq(Min, Max),
  331:     _ = [abs_bounds_1({A,B}) ||
  332:             A <- Seq,
  333:             B <- lists:nthtail(A-Min, Seq)],
  334:     ok.
  335: 
  336: abs_bounds_1(R) ->
  337:     {HighestMin,LowestMax} = min_max_unary_op('abs', R),
  338:     {Min,Max} = beam_bounds:bounds(abs, R),
  339:     if
  340:         Min =< HighestMin, LowestMax =< Max ->
  341:             ok;
  342:         true ->
  343:             io:format("~p(~p) evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  344:                       [bif_abs,R,{Min,Max},{HighestMin,LowestMax}]),
  345:             ct:fail(bad_min_or_max)
  346:         end.
  347: 
  348: infer_lt_gt_bounds(_Config) ->
  349:     {{'-inf',-1}, {'-inf',0}} = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',0}, {'-inf',0}),
  350:     {{'-inf',1}, {'-inf',2}} = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',1}, {'-inf',2}),
  351:     {{'-inf',-2}, {'-inf',-1}} = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',1}, {'-inf',-1}),
  352:     {{'-inf',2}, {1,3}} = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',2}, {1,3}),
  353: 
  354:     any = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',2}, {3,10}),
  355:     any = infer_lt_gt({'-inf',2}, {3,'+inf'}),
  356: 
  357:     {{0,10}, {1,84}}  = infer_lt_gt({0,10}, {'-inf',84}),
  358:     {{0,83}, {1,84}}  = infer_lt_gt({0,'+inf'}, {'-inf',84}),
  359: 
  360:     {{0,'+inf'}, {42, '+inf'}}  = infer_lt_gt({0,'+inf'}, {42, '+inf'}),
  361:     {{100,'+inf'}, {101, '+inf'}}  = infer_lt_gt({100,'+inf'}, {42, '+inf'}),
  362: 
  363:     ok.
  364: 
  365: %%% Utilities
  366: 
  367: infer_lt_gt(R1, R2) ->
  368:     case beam_bounds:infer_relop_types('>', R2, R1) of
  369:         {Rb,Ra} ->
  370:             {Ra,Rb} = beam_bounds:infer_relop_types('<', R1, R2);
  371:         any ->
  372:             any = beam_bounds:infer_relop_types('<', R1, R2)
  373:     end.
  374: 
  375: test_commutative(Op) ->
  376:     test_commutative(Op, {0,32}).
  377: 
  378: test_commutative(Op, {Min,Max}) ->
  379:     Seq = lists:seq(Min, Max),
  380:     _ = [test_commutative_1(Op, {A,B}, {C,D}) ||
  381:             A <- Seq,
  382:             B <- lists:nthtail(A-Min, Seq),
  383:             C <- lists:nthtail(A-Min, Seq),
  384:             D <- lists:nthtail(C-Min, Seq),
  385:             {A,B} =< {C,D}],
  386:     ok.
  387: 
  388: test_commutative_1(Op, R1, R2) ->
  389:     {HighestMin,LowestMax} = min_max_op(Op, R1, R2),
  390:     {Min,Max} = beam_bounds:bounds(Op, R1, R2),
  391:     {Min,Max} = beam_bounds:bounds(Op, R2, R1),
  392:     if
  393:         Min =< HighestMin, LowestMax =< Max ->
  394:             ok;
  395:         true ->
  396:             io:format("~p(~p, ~p) evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  397:                       [Op,R1,R2,{Min,Max},{HighestMin,LowestMax}]),
  398:             ct:fail(bad_min_or_max)
  399:         end.
  400: 
  401: test_noncommutative(Op, Range) ->
  402:     test_noncommutative(Op, Range, Range).
  403: 
  404: test_noncommutative(Op, {Min1,Max1}, {Min2,Max2}) ->
  405:     Seq1 = lists:seq(Min1, Max1),
  406:     Seq2 = lists:seq(Min2, Max2),
  407:     _ = [test_noncommutative_1(Op, {A,B}, {C,D}) ||
  408:             A <- Seq1,
  409:             B <- lists:nthtail(A-Min1, Seq1),
  410:             C <- Seq2,
  411:             D <- lists:nthtail(C-Min2, Seq2)],
  412:     ok.
  413: 
  414: test_noncommutative_1(Op, R1, R2) ->
  415:     {HighestMin,LowestMax} = min_max_op(Op, R1, R2),
  416:     case beam_bounds:bounds(Op, R1, R2) of
  417:         any ->
  418:             case {Op,R2} of
  419:                 {'div',{0,0}} -> ok;
  420:                 {'rem',{0,0}} -> ok
  421:             end;
  422:         {Min,Max} when Min =< HighestMin, LowestMax =< Max ->
  423:             ok;
  424:         {Min,Max} ->
  425:             io:format("~p(~p, ~p) evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  426:                       [Op,R1,R2,{Min,Max},{HighestMin,LowestMax}]),
  427:             ct:fail(bad_min_or_max)
  428:         end.
  429: 
  430: min_max_op(Op, {A,B}, {C,D}) ->
  431:     min_max_op_1(Op, A, B, C, D, {infinity,-(1 bsl 24)}).
  432: 
  433: min_max_op_1(Op, A, B, C, D, MinMax0) when A =< B ->
  434:     MinMax = min_max_op_2(Op, A, C, D, MinMax0),
  435:     min_max_op_1(Op, A + 1, B, C, D, MinMax);
  436: min_max_op_1(_Op, _, _, _, _, MinMax) ->
  437:     MinMax.
  438: 
  439: min_max_op_2(Op, A, 0, D, MinMax) when Op =:= 'div'; Op =:= 'rem' ->
  440:     min_max_op_2(Op, A, 1, D, MinMax);
  441: min_max_op_2(Op, A, C, D, MinMax) when C =< D ->
  442:     Val = erlang:Op(A, C),
  443:     case MinMax of
  444:         {Min,Max} when Min =< Val, Val =< Max ->
  445:             min_max_op_2(Op, A, C + 1, D, {Min,Max});
  446:         {Min,Max} ->
  447:             min_max_op_2(Op, A, C + 1, D, {min(Min, Val),max(Max, Val)})
  448:     end;
  449: min_max_op_2(_Op, _, _, _, MinMax) ->
  450:     MinMax.
  451: 
  452: min_max_unary_op(Op, {A,B}) ->
  453:     min_max_unary_op_1(Op, A, B, {infinity,-(1 bsl 24)}).
  454: 
  455: min_max_unary_op_1(Op, A, B, {Min,Max}) when A =< B ->
  456:     Val = erlang:Op(A),
  457:     if
  458:         Min =< Val, Val =< Max ->
  459:             min_max_unary_op_1(Op, A + 1, B, {Min,Max});
  460:         true ->
  461:             min_max_unary_op_1(Op, A + 1, B, {min(Min, Val),max(Max, Val)})
  462:     end;
  463: min_max_unary_op_1(_Op, _, _, MinMax) ->
  464:     MinMax.
  465: 
  466: test_relop(Op) ->
  467:     Max = 15,
  468:     Seq = lists:seq(0, Max),
  469:     _ = [test_relop_1(Op, {A,B}, {C,D}) ||
  470:             A <- Seq,
  471:             B <- lists:nthtail(A, Seq),
  472:             C <- Seq,
  473:             D <- lists:nthtail(C, Seq)],
  474:     ok.
  475: 
  476: test_relop_1(Op, R1, R2) ->
  477:     Bool = rel_op(Op, R1, R2),
  478:     case beam_bounds:relop(Op, R1, R2) of
  479:         Bool ->
  480:             test_infer_relop(Bool, Op, R1, R2);
  481:         Wrong ->
  482:             io:format("~p(~p, ~p) evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  483:                       [Op,R1,R2,Wrong,Bool]),
  484:             ct:fail(bad_bool_result)
  485:     end.
  486: 
  487: test_infer_relop(true, Op, R1, R2) ->
  488:     any = beam_bounds:infer_relop_types(Op, R1, R2);
  489: test_infer_relop(false, Op, R1, R2) ->
  490:     none = beam_bounds:infer_relop_types(Op, R1, R2);
  491: test_infer_relop('maybe', Op, {A0,B0}=R1, {C0,D0}=R2) ->
  492:     {{A,B},{C,D}} = beam_bounds:infer_relop_types(Op, R1, R2),
  493:     if
  494:         A =< B, C =< D, A0 =< A, B0 >= B, C0 =< C, D0 >= D ->
  495:             ok;
  496:         true ->
  497:             io:format("~p ~p infers as ~p ~p\n",
  498:                       [R1,R2,{A,B},{C,D}]),
  499:             ct:fail(ranges_grew)
  500:     end,
  501:     _ = [begin
  502:              case in_range(X, {A,B}) andalso in_range(Y, {C,D}) of
  503:                  true ->
  504:                      ok;
  505:                  false ->
  506:                      io:format("X = ~p; Y = ~p\n", [X,Y]),
  507:                      io:format("~p ~p infers as ~p ~p\n",
  508:                                [R1,R2,{A,B},{C,D}]),
  509:                      ct:fail(bad_inference)
  510:              end
  511:          end || X <- lists:seq(A0, B0),
  512:                 Y <- lists:seq(C0, D0),
  513:                 erlang:Op(X, Y)],
  514:     ok.
  515: 
  516: in_range(Int, {A,B}) ->
  517:     A =< Int andalso Int =< B.
  518: 
  519: rel_op(Op, {A,B}, {C,D}) ->
  520:     rel_op_1(Op, A, B, C, D, none).
  521: 
  522: rel_op_1(Op, A, B, C, D, BoolResult0) when A =< B ->
  523:     BoolResult = rel_op_2(Op, A, C, D, BoolResult0),
  524:     rel_op_1(Op, A + 1, B, C, D, BoolResult);
  525: rel_op_1(_Op, _, _, _, _, BoolResult) ->
  526:     BoolResult.
  527: 
  528: rel_op_2(Op, A, C, D, BoolResult0) when C =< D ->
  529:     Val = erlang:Op(A, C),
  530:     BoolResult = case BoolResult0 of
  531:                      none -> Val;
  532:                      Val -> BoolResult0;
  533:                      _ -> 'maybe'
  534:                  end,
  535:     rel_op_2(Op, A, C + 1, D, BoolResult);
  536: rel_op_2(_Op, _, _, _, BoolResult) ->
  537:     BoolResult.
  538: 
  539: redundant_masking(_Config) ->
  540:     Min = -7,
  541:     Max = 15,
  542:     Seq = lists:seq(Min, Max),
  543:     _ = [test_redundant_masking({A,B}, M) ||
  544:             A <- Seq,
  545:             B <- lists:nthtail(A-Min, Seq),
  546:             M <- Seq],
  547: 
  548:     false = beam_bounds:is_masking_redundant({'-inf',10}, 16#ff),
  549:     false = beam_bounds:is_masking_redundant({0,'+inf'}, 16#ff),
  550:     ok.
  551: 
  552: test_redundant_masking({A,B}=R, M) ->
  553:     ShouldBe = test_redundant_masking(A, B, M),
  554:     case beam_bounds:is_masking_redundant(R, M) of
  555:         ShouldBe ->
  556:             ok;
  557:         false when M band (M + 1) =/= 0 ->
  558:             %% M + 1 is not a power of two.
  559:             ok;
  560:         false when A =:= B ->
  561:             ok;
  562:         Unexpected ->
  563:             io:format("beam_bounds:is_masking_redundant(~p, ~p) "
  564:                       "evaluates to ~p; should be ~p\n",
  565:                       [R,M,Unexpected,ShouldBe]),
  566:             ct:fail(bad_boolean)
  567:     end.
  568: 
  569: test_redundant_masking(A, B, M) when A =< B ->
  570:     A band M =:= A andalso test_redundant_masking(A + 1, B, M);
  571: test_redundant_masking(_, _, _) -> true.
  572: 
  573: %%% Common utility functions.
  574: 
  575: id(I) -> I.
